Pioneering the future of Bangladesh!

We are a software development company that can communicate in Japanese and English in Dhaka, Bangladesh. By developing systems with the Japan - Bangladesh cooperative team, we can develop high quality systems with low development cost.

By developing systems with the Japan - Bangladesh cooperative team, we can develop high quality systems with low development cost.

Unique way of Working

Both remote work and office work are possible

Direct communication with Japanese clients is recommended

Realize smooth business execution remotely by utilizing business management systems such as Backlog

Colgis Co., Ltd. in Japan can be consulted for business problems and consultations

There are also opportunities for long-term business trips and residency in Japan
